title: Definitions
context: [ยง136-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, &ldquo;laser pointing device&rdquo; means any hand-held laser device, which is not designed as a sighting device for a weapon nor for use in a medical procedure. This term includes the commercially-available device, which is commonly known as a &ldquo;laser pen&rdquo; or &ldquo;laser pointer&rdquo;. [L 1999, c 94, pt of ยง1]
